name: Teach Me Sensei
description:
Only works with a controller, sorry!

Help your students reaching their targets by showing them the right moves. But beware, their lack of attention create an offset between what you teach and what they do.

Controls :
- Stick to manipulate the sensei hand
- A to teach a move
- B to cancel a move
- Start to go back to main menu

Made by :
- @Plumepox (art)
- @Kilirane (music)
- @DrGeraud (design and code)

A game made for the Global Game Jam 2018 (with a bit of additional polish)
